abilities.name: Orbital_Drop
abilities.info: ACTION: Spend 1 token from your strategy pool to place 2 infantry from your reinforcements on 1 planet you control.

abilities.name: Versatile
abilities.info: When you gain command tokens during the status phase, gain 1 additional command token.

promissory_note.name: Military Support
promissory_note.info: At the start of the Sol player's turn: Remove 1 token from the Sol player's strategy pool, if able, and return it to his reinforcements. Then, you may place 2 infantry from your reinforcements on any planet you control. Then return this card to the Sol player.

unit_upgrades.name: Spec Ops II
unit_upgrades.abilities: After this unit is destroyed, roll 1 die. If the result is 5 or greater, place the unit on this card. At the start of your next turn, place each unit that is on this card on a planet you control in your home system.

flagship.name: Genesis
abilities: At the end of the status phase, place 1 infantry from your reinforcements in this system's space area.

quote: Our enemies consider us children. They consider us weak. Show them. Show them what the children of Jord can do.
